en-US.AlreadyInTransaction: A transaction cannot be started when a transaction is already running.

en-US.EnumToTextFailure: {0} could not be converted to a value of {1}.
en-US.FieldNotFound: A named data field {0} was not found in the data access results.
en-US.InvalidBooleanValue: Null value in column {0} could not be converted to a boolean.

en-US.KeyNotFoundInDictionary: {0} was not found in the dictionary.
en-US.NotAFieldOfObject: Not a valid field of object.
en-US.NotTransactional: A transaction cannot be committed because the process is not transactional.
en-US.OpenLogFile: Unable to open log file {0} for writing.
en-US.SecondsTillStaleLessThanZero: SecondsTillStale must be equal to or greater than zero.
SecondsTillStale cannot be less than zero.
